basingScribes.title: BaSing Scribes
basingScribes.description: A social networking app built with React and JavaScript where users can create and share posts, follow others, and chat in real-time using Socket.io.

authDemo.title: Secure Authentication App
authDemo.description: Authentication system with JWT tokens, route guards, HTTP interceptors, and persistent login. Built with Angular 20 and modern security practices.

taskFlow.title: Task Flow Management
taskFlow.description: Task management application built with Angular and NgRx for state management. Features include task creation, updates, filtering, and reactive state handling.
